tool_description: A dictionary and so much more! Rich information for a word with definitions, associations, examples, and much more.
name: Word Dictionary
title: Word Dictionary

api_list.name: Theme
api_list.description: Get the themes of a word.

required_parameters.name: entry
required_parameters.description: Type a word to get its themes

api_list.name: Difficulty
api_list.description: Get the difficulty level of a word.

required_parameters.name: entry
required_parameters.description: Type a word to get its difficulty level

api_list.name: Example
api_list.description: See examples of a word used in a sentence

required_parameters.name: entry
required_parameters.description: Type a word to see examples of it used in a sentence

api_list.name: Reference
api_list.description: Get the broad terms, narrow terms, related terms, evocations, synonyms, associations, and derived terms of a word.

required_parameters.name: entry
required_parameters.description: Type a word to get its broad terms, narrow terms, related terms, evocations, synonyms, associations, and derived terms

api_list.name: Association
api_list.description: Get the associations of a word.

required_parameters.name: entry
required_parameters.description: Type a word to get its associations

api_list.name: Exam History
api_list.description: See which exams a word has been on

required_parameters.name: entry
required_parameters.description: Type a word to see which exams it has been on

api_list.name: Definition
api_list.description: Get the definitions of a word.
